analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/11/0x640c88a3f7dbd2cbeb4821b0436eb49af86a2aad.sol:
	Contract MilkToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/11/0x640c88a3f7dbd2cbeb4821b0436eb49af86a2aad.sol)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
